item.title: EAO-SLAM
item.description: EAO-SLAM: Monocular Semi-Dense Object SLAM Based on Ensemble Data Association Authors Yanmin Wu, Yunzhou Zhang*, Delong Zhu, Yonghui Feng, Sonya Coleman and Dermot Kerr âœ‰ wuyanminmax@gmail.com, * zhangyunzhou@mail.neu.edu.cn Abstract Object-level data association and pose estimation play a fundamental role in semantic SLAM, which remain unsolved due to the lack of robust and accurate algorithms. In this work, we propose an ensemble data associate strategy to integrate the parametric and nonparametric
